title: OPROMA

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.6M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with OPROMA. The average
  contract duration was 1.52 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $176.6K.
  The longest contract was 6.06 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $1.6M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '44'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '30%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '169%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.31'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '3.4M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.52'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '176.6K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '6.06'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.6M'
